name: ColourPop Fresh Kiss Exfoliating Lip Scrub - Nourishing Lip Exfoliator to Gently Buff & Soften Skin - Enriched with Cocoa & Shea Butter to Lock in Moisture - Vanilla Cake (0.37 oz)
short_description: Gently Exfoliates & Conditions - Superfine sugar crystals buff away dry, flaky skin for softer, smoother lips, making this the perfect prep step for lip makeup.
Nourishing Hydration- Our lip scrubs are enriched with Shea Butter, Cupuacu Butter, Sweet Almond Oil, and Jojoba Oil to lock in moisture and keep lips feeling soft and hydrated.
More Deets - Pair this lip scrub exfoliator with our Fresh Kiss Glossy Lip Balm for the most hydrated, kissable lips ever.

Application Tips - Gently massage a pea-sized amount of the lip exfoliator using circular motions, then wipe away excess with a damp towel. Follow with a hydrating lip mask or lipstick for a smooth, hydrated finish.
Obsession-Worthy Beauty - We believe beauty should be fun, fearless, and accessible. That’s why we serve up trend-setting, cruelty-free formulas made for real life.
product_description: Experience smooth, refreshed lips with the ColourPop Exfoliating Lip Scrub, a gentle yet effective treatment designed to buff away dry, flaky skin. Each variation is infused with fine sugar crystals that exfoliate without irritation, revealing a soft, supple surface ready for your favorite lip color or balm. A nourishing blend of shea butter and vitamin E provides essential moisture, while a range of delicious flavor options creates a sensorial treat during every use. Whether you prefer something sweet or subtly fragrant, each scrub offers a unique scent experience to elevate your daily lip care ritual. Compact and travel-friendly, this vegan and cruelty-free formula fits easily into any beauty routine, delivering smooth results at home or on the go. Ideal for those who value clean, effective skincare, ColourPop’s exfoliating scrubs help maintain healthy lips in every season.

When you wake up, wipe away any generous excess as a little goes a long way!
